str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and eudokeo; to think well of in common, i.e. Assent to, feel gratified with.
To inhabit, dwell, indwell. From oikos; to occupy a house, i.e. Reside; by implication, to cohabit.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
